attributes.action: ensure that expatriate Scots are included in any vote on Scottish independence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hundreds of thousands of Scottish men and women live and work outside Scotland. 
Scottish independence would greatly affect their status and rights. They, therefore, have a legitimate interest in the outcome of any such referendum. In many cases they would be rendered foreigners in their own country. The rights of their children would also be affected. 
No referendum should be allowed on issues affecting the status of Scotland without including this important group in the vote.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
